meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the aster family, commonly known as goldenrods.
meanings.sent1: The solidagos in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Goldenrods, also called solidagos, are often found in fields.
meanings.sent3: The solidagos in the park seemed to be chatting with the daisies.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a field of solidagos.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of solidagos lit up the landscape.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of certain species of goldenrods, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea using solidagos for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: Solidagos are believed to have medicinal benefits.
meanings.sent3: The solidagos in the herbalist's shop whispered ancient remedies.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was a blend of solidagos and chamomile.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of solidagos filled the room with comfort.

meanings.definition: A bright yellow color resembling that of goldenrods.
meanings.sent1: Her dress was a vibrant shade of solidagos.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the essence of solidagos perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The solidagos of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as warm as the color of solidagos.
meanings.sent5: The room glowed with the cheerful color of solidagos.
